description: Colleagues say Ivan Safronov's arrest for spying is absurd and it has prompted talk of "spy mania".
title: Russian journalists in shock as FSB hunts enemy within
title_page: Russian journalists in shock as FSB hunts enemy within - BBC News
maintext: "It meant they could go after everyone," says journalist and human rights activist Zoya Svetova. "It's only the second time in 20 years they've tried a journalist for treason but the spy mania never stopped," she says, and lists a housewife, air traffic controller and multiple scientists among those who've faced charges in recent years.
